Uses of Class
com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process.ProcessOutputStreamSettings

Packages that use ProcessOutputStreamSettings
com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process Contains ProcessBuilder2, Process2, and supporting classes. 
 

Uses of ProcessOutputStreamSettings in com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process
 

Subclasses of ProcessOutputStreamSettings in com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process
 class ProcessOutputStreamSettingsAfterStart
          This simple class holds the settings for child process output streams (either STDOUT or STDERR) after the child process starts.

protected  ReadInputStreamThread Process2.createReadInputStreamThread(InputStream inputStream, ProcessOutputStreamSettings settings, String streamName)
          Creates, but does not start (spawn), a new thread to read either STDOUT or STDERR stream from a child process.
protected  ReadInputStreamThread Process2.createReadInputStreamThreadAndStart(InputStream inputStream, ProcessOutputStreamSettings settings, String streamName)
          This method: Creates a new thread by via Process2.createReadInputStreamThread(InputStream, ProcessOutputStreamSettings, String) Sets the name of the thread via Process2.setThreadName(Thread, String) Spawns the new thread via Thread.start()
